channel.title: Documentations on Poke
channel.description: Recent content in Documentations on Poke

item.title: Getting started
item.description: All Poke’s components are hosted on GitHub under the warp-poke organisation. This organisation provides some agents in order to check protocols: HTTP: https://github.com/warp-poke/http-rust-agent DNS: https://github.com/warp-poke/dns-rust-agent SSL: https://github.com/warp-poke/ssl-go-agent Furthermore, there is an API that manage checks and their scheduling: API: https://github.com/warp-poke/poke-api. Start using docker-compose On the poke-compose repository, there is all you need to setup a docker-based poke infrastructure. This infrastructure used the standalone version of each distributed components.
